product_description: Who are we? Well, we seek out the finest natural and organic foods available, maintain the strictest quality standards in the industry, and have an unshakeable commitment to sustainable agriculture. We ban 300+ ingredients from all food that we sell, including hydrogenated fats, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as aspartame, sucralose and saccharin, so you can skip deciphering ingredient labels and cut to relishing your finds. Our 365 by Whole Foods Market brand offers over 2,500 affordably priced and thoughtfully sourced products that not only meet our already strict standards, but also in many cases go above and beyond what we require of other brands.

name: Mac Yourself | Delicious Cheddar Cheese Sauce Mix | Perfect Cheese Powder for Macaroni, Nachos, Veggies and More | 9.3 oz
short_description: SIMPLE MAC & CHEESE | No more having to buy boxes of mac & cheese! With Mac Yourself, simply add to cooked pasta, butter and milk and voila! Delicious mac-n-cheese

SAUCE IT OR SHAKE IT | Mac Yourself is easy and versatile. Makes a delicious, creamy cheese sauce for mac and cheese, nachos, potatoes, and vegetables. Or simply shake it on popcorn, pizza or garlic bread!
PERFECT FOR BIG MEALS | Ideal for big family dinners or group events! Each bottle makes up to 28 servings. Enough to feed a whole camp full of kids!
DELICIOUSLY CHEESY | Get that favorite Krafty flavor but creamier! You can control how much goes into your meal. Add a little or add a lot, no more running out!
NO ARTIFICIAL COLORS | Pure cheddar flavor you can trust — Mac Yourself Cheddar Cheese Powder is made with NO artificial colorings, delivering rich, cheesy taste without unnecessary additives.

product_description: Help yourself to a bowl of comfort. Kids and adults love the classic taste of Kraft Original Mac & Cheese Macaroni and Cheese Dinner. Our 7.25-ounce mac and cheese box includes macaroni pasta and original flavor cheese sauce mix, so you just need milk and margarine or butter to make tasty mac and cheese kids love. Our warm, cheesy macaroni goodness fills your belly and feeds your soul. With no artificial flavors, preservatives or dyes, Kraft Macaroni and Cheese is always a great choice for family dinners. Looking for quick meals, sides or kids meals? Our beloved Blue Box mac and cheese brings easy meals together. Simply boil water, stir in macaroni and cook 7-8 minutes. Drain the macaroni and return to the pan. Then add margarine or butter, milk and cheese sauce mix, and mix well. Stir up new ways to enjoy Kraft Mac n Cheese by adding protein or seasonings to make it your own. Try crispy bacon, shredded rotisserie chicken, steamed broccoli, hot sauce, and more! A wholesome tradition, Kraft Mac & Cheese has been bringing generations together since 1937. Kraft Mac & Cheese inspires the positive power of comfort, so stock up with our 4 pack of dinner sides and enjoy cheesy goodness anytime.

WE’RE EXTRA CHEESY Stouffer’s cheddar cheese sauce and shell pasta come with 10% more cheese sauce than Velveeta Original Shells & Cheese 12oz. What makes our cheddar cheese sauce extra creamy is the fact that it’s made with real cheese
Whether you're hosting a gathering or simply enjoying a cozy night in, Stouffer's provides tasty and convenient options that will make your football game day even more enjoyable.
CREAMY N CHEESY COMFORT IN 10 MIN Our pasta shells and cheese only take 10 minutes to make, and there are no additional ingredients required -- so you don’t need to worry about additional prep work

SUPREME TASTE FROM QUALITY INGREDIENTS Our boxed dinners are made from quality ingredients you can feel good about. This multi-serve mac and cheese dinner kit is a good source of protein and calcium. It also has no artificial colors or synthetic flavors colors added from natural sources
TRUSTED SINCE 1924 Since 1924, we’ve been providing families with great tasting and effortless comfort food to enjoy on any day of the week
product_description: A dinner that pleases the whole family does exist with Stouffer’s Shells and Cheese, boxed mac cheese. Our dinner kit can be cooked in 10 minutes and requires no extra ingredients. In a medium saucepan, boil 8 cups of water. Pour the pasta shells into the boiling water, cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Then drain the water from the pasta shells and add in the liquid cheese sauce. Stir the cheese sauce in until fully mixed. Our cheddar cheese sauce and shell pasta are made with real cheese and has 10% more cheese sauce than Velveeta Original Shells Cheese 12oz. Stouffer’s Supreme boxed mac and cheese is a classic pantry food that will make you smile with every spoonful (or forkful). It’s a pantry mac the whole family will love.

name: Annie's Macaroni and Classic Cheddar with Organic Pasta, Made with Real Cheese, Dinner Side or Snack, 6 oz (Pack of 12)
short_description: KIDS DINNER ADDITION OR SNACK: Annie's cheddar macaroni and cheese is ready in about eight minutes for a tasty kids lunch addition or part of a quick family meal
MAC AND CHEESE: Annie's macaroni and cheese brings creamy, cheesy goodness to family dinner sides with organic pasta and real cheddar cheese
NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS: Delicious kids mac and cheese made without artificial flavors or synthetic colors
TASTY VERSATILITY: Mac and cheese is perfect as a side dish; in recipes like baked bacon mac and cheese, or paired with chicken nuggets; Serve as snacks for kids
CONTAINS: Twelve 6 oz boxes of Annie's Macaroni and Classic Cheddar
product_description: Bring creamy, cheesy goodness to your family table with Annie's Macaroni and Classic Cheddar. Made with elbow macaroni and real cheddar cheese, Annie's mac and cheese offers a great-tasting adult and kids dinner addition packed with irresistible flavor. Annie's mac and cheese with organic pasta contains cheese from cows not treated with rBST*, offering quality ingredients in every tasty bite. This pasta and cheese dinner side contains no artificial flavors or synthetic colors for a tasty serving of Annie's macaroni and cheese you can feel good about. Kids and adults will love the rich combination of real cheese and pasta, making it a perfect addition to lunch, dinner, or any time you're in the mood for something downright delicious. Annie's cheddar mac and cheese is ready in about eight minutes, helping you spend less time in the kitchen so you can enjoy quality time sharing a meal with your family. All you have to do is boil the pasta in water and drain in a colander. Follow package directions to add reduced fat milk, 2 tablespoons of salted butter, and the cheese packet. Then stir and enjoy. Serve Annie's macaroni and cheese as a side dish, use it to prepare baked bacon mac and cheese for your next family meal, or pair it with other kids food like chicken nuggets. This six-ounce box is easy to store in the pantry and contains about two-and-a-half servings for a quick kids mac and cheese dinner addition. Annie's makes products in over 20 family-friendly categories, from fruit-flavored snacks and cereal to mac and cheese. For busy bunnies and families on the go, we help make life a little easier and more delicious by spreading goodness through tasty foods and kindness to the planet. *No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rBST-treated and non rBST-treated cows.
